text: In honor of her engagement, the bride - to - be appeared at Kensington Palace arm - in - arm with Prince Harry to pose for his or her official pictures. She wore a white wrap coat from the Canadian model, Line the Label, an emerald P. A. R. O. S. H gown and nude pumps from Aquazzura. Shortly after, Line the Label ’ s website crashed because the world rushed to get the Fits actress ’ outerwear. In line with Meghan ’ s ensemble, white is a go - to hue regardless of the time of yr, and everybody, together with celebrities, agrees.
